Plot: An old man recalls his time painting houses for his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.
Title: The Irishman
Actors: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci, Harvey Keitel
Awards: Nominated for 10 Oscars. Another 71 wins & 312 nominations.
Writer: Steven Zaillian (screenplay by), Charles Brandt (based upon the book by)
